channel.title: Comments on: Lemon Marshmallow and Lemon Sherbet

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi everyone, thanks again for the lovely comments. I really love reading them all! :)
Hi Sophia - They are a bit different from the bought ones, very lovely.
Hi Anh - Mmmm.. dipped in chocolate, great idea!
Hi Helen - I've put my altered version in the recipe above. It's quite nice, with quite a bit of fizz, but not too much.
item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone, thanks again for the lovely comments. I really love reading them all! ðŸ™‚

Hi Sophia – They are a bit different from the bought ones, very lovely.

Hi Anh – Mmmm.. dipped in chocolate, great idea!

Hi Helen – I’ve put my altered version in the recipe above. It’s quite nice, with quite a bit of fizz, but not too much.

item.title: By: Forager
item.dc:creator: Forager
item.description: This looks great! I'm always on the lookout for lemon recipes with an overproductive lemon tree - but marshmallow making scares me. Well done on how yours turned out. They look great!
item.content:encoded: This looks great! I’m always on the lookout for lemon recipes with an overproductive lemon tree – but marshmallow making scares me. Well done on how yours turned out. They look great!

item.title: By: Trisha
item.dc:creator: Trisha
item.description: Marshmallows aren't my most favourite things in the world, but I do appreciate the skills and sheer talent required to make these snow white beauties! So impressive!
item.content:encoded: Marshmallows aren’t my most favourite things in the world, but I do appreciate the skills and sheer talent required to make these snow white beauties! So impressive!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Your marshmallows look like light tasty clouds! Divine!
item.content:encoded: Your marshmallows look like light tasty clouds! Divine!

item.title: By: Helen (Grab Your Fork)
item.dc:creator: Helen (Grab Your Fork)
item.description: yum - i love the sound of these. what a great idea to pair sherbet and marshmallow - shame the sherbet over-powered it a little but maybe the sherbet could be tweaked so it's not as strong?
item.content:encoded: yum – i love the sound of these. what a great idea to pair sherbet and marshmallow – shame the sherbet over-powered it a little but maybe the sherbet could be tweaked so it’s not as strong?

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Ooh I love homemade marshmallows so much more than the store bought kind. They're so light and delicious aren't they!
item.content:encoded: Ooh I love homemade marshmallows so much more than the store bought kind. They’re so light and delicious aren’t they!

item.title: By: grace
item.dc:creator: grace
item.description: iâ€™m pretty ashamed to admit that iâ€™ve never made marshmallows. i have no problem with the jet-puffed stuff, but the fact that there is no store-bought lemon option is a definite problem. your little clouds look perfect and definitely would be deliciousâ€”nicely done!
item.content:encoded: iâ€™m pretty ashamed to admit that iâ€™ve never made marshmallows. i have no problem with the jet-puffed stuff, but the fact that there is no store-bought lemon option is a definite problem. your little clouds look perfect and definitely would be deliciousâ€”nicely done!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: I like the sparkle on the glass in photo 5. I always liked whizz fizz as a kid, but I'd never thought of making sherbet. It sounds good if you can get the sweet and sour ratio right.
item.content:encoded: I like the sparkle on the glass in photo 5. I always liked whizz fizz as a kid, but I’d never thought of making sherbet. It sounds good if you can get the sweet and sour ratio right.

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: the thought of making marshmallows scares me! Yours look like little fluffy pillows...so pretty!
item.content:encoded: the thought of making marshmallows scares me! Yours look like little fluffy pillows…so pretty!

item.title: By: Anh
item.dc:creator: Anh
item.description: You have really mastered the skill to make marshmallow. I like the idea of pairing with sherbet. Otherwise I will just dip them in chocolate. So good!
item.content:encoded: You have really mastered the skill to make marshmallow. I like the idea of pairing with sherbet. Otherwise I will just dip them in chocolate. So good!
